about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Who are we and why are we here?
about.whoWeAreText: Founded in 2020, our company prioritizes quality and customer satisfaction, establishing a solid place in the e-commerce sector. With a wide product range and professional team, we always aim to provide the best service.
about.missionText: To offer reliable, quality, and accessible products while maintaining the highest customer satisfaction.
about.visionText: To be a leading, innovative, and strong global brand in the industry.
